news_header: Man escapes police after crashing stolen car at airport.
news_original_title: Poliisi jahtasi miestä Kööpenhaminan lentoasemalla, ilmatila suljettiin
news_text: A man crashed a stolen car into a fence at Copenhagen airport and escaped into the area. The airspace was closed for about two hours but reopened shortly after. Police are searching for the suspect.
